name: the forest underwater
description: Hi my name is Navaeh.Brown and this is my game called the forest underwater to control my game you need to use the arrow keys and try to avoid Mel. She  is the enemy if you hit her you will lose one life you start with three lives once there all gone it is a game over. When a vine ball pops up on the screen that's you shield you will get it then it will form a dome around you if you bump into Mel you sheild willl get taken away you will not lose a life. If you hit a vacume all the enemies will disappear and once you eat more food your enemies will appear one by one.
